name: authorizedbuyersmarketplace_buyers_auctionPackages_list
description: List the auction packages subscribed by a buyer and its clients.

parent.description: Required. Name of the parent buyer that can access the auction package. Format: `buyers/{accountId}`

pageSize.description: Requested page size. The server may return fewer results than requested. Max allowed page size is 500.

pageToken.description: The page token as returned. ListAuctionPackagesResponse.nextPageToken

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Response message for listing auction packages.

$ul: **nextPageToken**: Continuation token for fetching the next page of results. Pass this value in the ListAuctionPackagesRequest.pageToken field in the subsequent call to the `ListAuctionPackages` method to retrieve the next page of results.
